text: Hello! So tell me, what do you know about the Save the Children organization?
It's a nonprofit, thats about it. Why?,
I think it's a rather important topic of discussion mainly because there are so many children dying of hunger each day.
You're not wrong about that, at all. It's disturbing.
Absolutely! I think most people don't trust these organizations because they believe them to be untrustworthy in regards to donations. This nonprofit is actually trustworthy from what I can see.
My issue with many is that they tend to use more of their donations to cover their "overhead" then to actually help the cause they claim to support. I research before I donate, generally speaking

Very understandable. I tend to research before investing time or money into any endeavor to be honest. For instance, with the Save the Children org, I've read that they've been contributing support and giving aid to children in developing countries that severely need it. Truly a noble cause.
I completely agree.
Are you familiar with the situation in Syria currently?
Yes, very much. Syria has been devestated
To be more specific, there are millions of Syrian children currently that are facing threats of violence daily. 1,000 children have been killed or injured just in the first few months of 2018.
Correct. I donate to UNICEF on a fairly frequent basis to help.
That's awesome. How do you usually go about donating?
On the UNICEF website itself
That makes sense. Would you consider donating a portion of your mturk payment to Save the Children?
I'll donate 1/2, so $1
That's fantastic! So to confirm, you would like to donate $1 from your payment to the Save the Children org, correct?
Absolutely, and thank you.
The research team will collect any donation made and send it to Save the Children! Thank you!
I certainly hope they really do, would love to see the results!
